io.micronaut.security.ldap.context

Interface ContextBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultContextBuilder

    public interface ContextBuilder
    Contract for building and closing LDAP contexts.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    James Kleeh
